name: Ralf's Repairs
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam in one week.  In this game, you play as Ralf, a super Genius who made a time machine in order to  "Rewind" to a better time. In the process, his time machine broke and stranded him in an unknown time and place. It is your task to help him fix his time machine...  All of the art was made during the Jam.

Controls:

WASD to move,

Shift to sprint,

Enter to deposit Items.

Exploration Mode has no Enemies
